price: 64. Tolkayow! Tani waa Hashii Alle, oo idiin ah calaamad (mucjiso), ee iska daaya ha daaqdo arlada Alle, hana u gaysannina wax xumaan ah, si aanay idiinku dhicin Cadaab dhow15.
arabic: وَيَٰقَوۡمِ هَٰذِهِۦ نَاقَةُ ٱللَّهِ لَكُمۡ ءَايَةٗۖ فَذَرُوهَا تَأۡكُلۡ فِيٓ أَرۡضِ ٱللَّهِۖ وَلَا تَمَسُّوهَا بِسُوٓءٖ فَيَأۡخُذَكُمۡ عَذَابٞ قَرِيبٞ
footnotes: 15. Dilkooda hasha wuxuu ahaa xadgudub weyn iyo ku dhiirrasho wuxuu ka reebay Nabigoodii Saalix, sidaas awgeed buu Alle u xukumay inuu cadaabo isagoo ku xaddiday cumrigooda oo keliya seddex maalmood, wuxuuna amray inay sahay qaataan oo raaxeystaan seddex maalmood ku digasho ahaan.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wayāqawmi hādhihi nāqatu al-lahi lakum āyatan fadharūhā takul fī arḍi al-lahi walā tamassūhā bisūin fayakhudhakum ʿadhābun qarībun
